name: Rust - Basic Setup
description: Minimal Sentry configuration for error tracking in a Rust application
useCase: Getting started with Sentry error tracking in Rust
seGuidance: Perfect for Rust applications just getting started with Sentry. The guard returned by sentry::init must be kept alive for the duration of the application. When dropped, it will flush remaining events. Use capture_error! or capture_message! macros for reporting.
